paddy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a field in which rice is grown in water
paddy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a state of being angry or upset
paddy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The news put Mum in a bit of a paddy.
paddy.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a very offensive word for someone from Ireland. Do not use this word.
